frontmatter.title: ButtonRow
frontmatter.description: `Form.ButtonRow` is a wrapper for horizontally separated buttons.

frontmatter.title: Element
frontmatter.description: `Form.Element` is a wrapper component for the HTML form element.

frontmatter.title: Handler
frontmatter.description: `Form.Handler` provides both the DataContext.Provider and a HTML form element.

frontmatter.title: MainHeading
frontmatter.description: `Form.MainHeading` is a standardized main heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubHeading
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubHeading` is a standardized sub heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubmitButton
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubmitButton` connects to the `Form.Handler` to submit the active state of the internal DataContext, triggering `onSubmit`.
